title: Vulkan Engine
description: A simple vulkan based renderer. It can load models and have a camera module to navigate in the scene.

title: Physics Engine
description: Physics engine using verlet integration to compute the positions. The simulation have a spatial hashing structure applied to the objects to be able to quickly detect collisions to solve them. It uses OpenGL to render the simulation.

title: Game of the Amazons
description:
Implementation of the Game of the Amazons, a two player board game, with an AI opponent. This project was developed in team of 4 students. I led my team's software architecture and optimisations which, in addition to our advanced heuristics, made us win the competition against 28 other teams' AIs. KCacheGrind and Gprof were used for the needed optimisations as winning an Amazons game is a PSPACE-complete problem. The board is represented as a sparse matrix using GSL. Full report avaible: French.
I made my own web port using WebAssembly.
